paper_metadata.title: Impact of Agricultural Youth Empowerment Scheme on Youth Welfare in Southwestern Nigeria

program_information.region: Southwestern Nigeria (Oyo State and Lagos State)

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: The impact of participation on the monthly per capita expenditure was estimated to increase by N6,946.47 for the beneficiaries and it reduced the poverty status by 46.8 percent
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: this study was designed to estimate the impact of the program on the welfare of youths in Southwestern Nigeria using the logit model and propensity score matching

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Among the various programs put in place is the agricultural youth empowerment scheme (AgricYES) which started in 2010 in the southwestern part of the country
evidence_citations.country_citation: A multistage sampling technique was used to randomly select 316 beneficiaries and 656 non-beneficiaries across 2 states (Oyo State and Lagos State)
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: in Nigeria, the age of youth falls between 18 and 35 years
